billing.tips.currency.restrictions.translation:
CAD currency is restricted to Onica customers who live in Canada.
AUD, EUR, and GBP currencies are only available when Managed Azure Cloud product is selected.

customer.channel.select.translation: Select VMware Cloud on AWS Transaction Type

customer.desc.vmc.channeltype.aws.translation: Choose this option if the customer originated from AWS or needs to transact VMC on AWS on AWS paper.

customer.desc.vmc.channeltype.publicsect.translation: Choose this option if the customer IS a Public Sector/State, Local, and Education (SLED) customer that needs to transact through RGS/Carahsoft.

customer.desc.vmc.channeltype.standard.translation: Choose this option if the customer was originated by Rackspace or VMware and IS NOT a Public Sector/State, Local, and Education (SLED) customer.

customer.tips.rbu.productRestriction.translation: Currently RBU customers only have access to Managed AWS

customer.tips.vmc.channeltype.alert.translation: Please be sure of your choice as this affects finance and compensation. If you are not sure please contact <0>{email}</0> for guidance.

user.status.create.success.translation: User {username} has been created in account {accountname} with a domain ID of {ddi}.

user.tips.username.generate.translation: If your first name or last name is changed, a new username will be automatically generated for you.
